name: Verify POST /posts with missing title creates a post (JSONPlaceholder behavior)
description: This test verifies the behavior of the /posts endpoint when a POST request is made with a missing 'title' field. JSONPlaceholder is expected to create the post and return a null title.
descriptionHtml: This test verifies the behavior of the /posts endpoint when a POST request is made with a missing 'title' field. JSONPlaceholder is expected to create the post and return a null title.

testStage.description: This test verifies the behavior of the /posts endpoint when a POST request is made with a missing 'title' field. JSONPlaceholder is expected to create the post and return a null title.

steps.name: Performing POST /posts request with missing title, body 'a body without a title', userId 1 and validating response
